<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4352</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Constructing Electrical Conductivity Kits -- Teacher's Guide</string>
            <string language="es">Creación de kits de conductividad eléctrica</string>
            <string language="ga">Trealamh Seoltacht Leictreach a Thógáil – Treoir an Mhúinteora</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrische Leitfähigkeit-Installationssätze 
Konstruieren -- Anleitung Des Lehrers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Construisant des Kits de Conductivité 
Électrique -- Le Guide du Professeur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Construindo Jogos Do Conductivity Elétrico -- 
Guia Do Professor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Costruendo I Kit Di Conduttività elettrica -- 
Guida Dell'Insegnante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατασκευάζοντας τις εξαρτήσεις ηλεκτρικής αγωγιμότητας
-- οδηγός του δασκάλου</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Using simple, inexpensive components and basic DIY skills, electrical conductivity test circuits can be easily constructed for use in the laboratory.</string>
            <string language="es">Se pueden crear circuitos de pruebas de conductividad eléctrica fácilmente, para usarlos en el laboratorio, usando componentes sencillos y con precios asequibles.</string>
            <string language="ga">Is féidir ciorcaid tástála seoltacht leictreach a thógáil go héasca le húsáid sa saotharlann trí úsáid a bhaint as comhábhair shimplí, shaora agus scileanna bunúsacha DFÉ.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science</string>
            <string language="es">Ciencias</string>
            <string language="ga">Eolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Physics</string>
            <string language="es">Física</string>
            <string language="ga">Fisic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Additional Resource</string>
            <string language="es">Recurso adicional</string>
            <string language="ga">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mit einfach können billigen Bestandteilen und 
grundlegenden DIY Fähigkeiten Teststromkreise der elektrischen 
Leitfähigkeit für Gebrauch im Labor leicht konstruiert werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En utilisant simple, des composants peu coûteux 
et les qualifications de base de DIY, des circuits d'essai de 
conductivité électrique peuvent être facilement construits pour 
l'usage dans le laboratoire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usando simples, os componentes baratos e as 
habilidades básicas de DIY, circuitos do teste do conductivity 
elétrico podem fàcilmente ser construídos para o uso no 
laboratório.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usando semplice, i componenti economici e le 
abilità di base di DIY, circuiti della prova di conduttività 
elettrica possono essere costruiti facilmente per uso in laboratorio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρησιμοποιώντας τα απλά, ανέξοδα συστατικά και τις 
βασικές δεξιότητες DIY, τα κυκλώματα δοκιμής ηλεκτρικής 
αγωγιμότητας μπορούν να κατασκευαστούν εύκολα για τη χρήση στο 
εργαστήριο.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusätzliches Hilfsmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource Supplémentaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso Adicional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόσθετο στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
